original_title: Comunidade do Maciel - Há uma gota de sangue em cada poema
overview: Anthropological documentary about the brothels located in the Pelourinho area. A community formed by prostitutes, homosexuals, thieves, drug dealers and groups of families in the center of the city of Salvador. They occupy an architecture that once belonged to the elite.
title: Comunidade do Maciel - Há uma gota de sangue em cada poema
